attributes.review: Absolutely horrendous!! It took hours to download, and kept skiing me for my personal information, credit card, phone number, etc.!!! Do not get this app. EVER
attributes.title: Don’t get this app!!!

attributes.review: It just redirects me to social media and constantly asks to track my location. Like every 2-3 clicks it pops up needing my location. Deleting this app now.

attributes.review: Immediately got several spam calls and block text messages. Must be a Chinese application. Mediately noticed that my phone was slower to.

attributes.review: When the app downloaded it stole all my data and info and my phone was just wiped out and it took four days to put it back to normal and it was 70 dollars 💩💩💩

attributes.review: Right when I open the app, it was super glitchy and laggy. It would take forever to load, and sometimes would make my phone turn of. Don’t ever get this app!!!

attributes.review: This app was horrible it keep on trying to sell this idea that people don’t deserve rights unless they look like a white washed piece of kitchen ware that you got at a second hand thrift store for 69¢.
attributes.title: Worst app ever made!

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!! when I downloaded this app, it pushed me down the stairs, which are made out of stone, and it broke both my arms😰 then it stole all of my food out of my fridge and pantry. Seriously don’t download it, it killed my pet dinosaur😞😔
attributes.title: ⚠️ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!!⚠️

attributes.review:
This app is outstandingly garbage

1.this app to more years to download than that crusty orange’s age

2. A couple seconds after I downloaded this, dozens of oranges raided my fridge holding me captive inside of their white van

3. THE WORST OF THEM ALL YET, after they released me I have been overdosed with a white and sticky substance turning me into an Oompa Loompa for sex trafficking, if your reading this please help I am located near Willy Wonka’s chocolate factory S.O.S
attributes.title: This app is outstanding
